description.p: Axe Electrum's focus is speed and simplicity, with low resource usage. It uses remote servers that handle the most complicated parts of the Axe system, and it allows you to recover your wallet from a secret phrase.

Do not trust. Verify.
Axe Electrum verifies that your transactions are in the Axe blockchain.
Because Axe is not about trust, It is about freedom and independence.

ul.li: Safe: Your private keys are encrypted and never leave your computer
Forgiving: Your funds can be recovered from a secret phrase
Instant On: Axe Electrum is fast, because it uses servers that index the Axe blockchain
No lock-In: You can export your private keys and use them in other Axe clients
No Downtimes: Axe Electrum servers are decentralized and redundant. Your wallet is never down
Proof Checking: Axe Electrum Wallet verifies all the transactions in your history using SPV
Cold Storage: Keep your private keys offline, and go online with a watching-only wallet
Multisig: Split the permission to spend your coins between several wallets
Add-ons: Axe Electrum supports third-party plugins: Multisig services, Hardware wallets, etc
